#include <cmath>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b){
	int c;
	while(a!=0){
		c = a;
		a = b%a;
		b = c;
	}
	return b;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--){
		int x1, x2, y1, y2;
		cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
		int a=abs(x1-x2), b=abs(y1-y2);
		int k = gcd(a,b);
		if(k==1)
			cout << (a+b-1) << "\n";
		else{
			cout << (a+b-k) << "\n";
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
